title: Is BLACKPINK overtaking BTS in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: I kind of feel like this is a no-brainer. I know some people will want to bring hate and say that I hate Blackpink. I stan both of them, mind you. Now let’s get to the actual answer. I feel like it’s clearly BTS. Both groups are amazing, but BTS are more popular for a few reasons (none of these are meant to put BP down, I stan both groups and I’m giving an unbiased answer to this question): They have a bigger fandom. They have 13M monthly listeners on Spotify. They also have 5M users on their Weverse, and 31.8M subscribers on YT. To top that, BTS has 20M followers on V LIVE. That isn’t even all of the ARMYs. There are, of course, ARMYs that don’t have access to any of these or don’t follow/subscribe to these.They have won many awards. They’ve won approximately 221 awards. That’s a lot. Heck, they went to the Grammys. Sadly, they didn’t win a Grammy, but they got the opportunity to perform. That’s big.BTS sell out stadium concerts. I haven’t heard of a BP stadium concert actually selling out. I know YG has lied about that before. But if they do, that’s good for them.BTS has more Spotify streams than BP. BTS is the second most-streamed group under Imagine Dragons. BP hasn’t topped that (I bet they could if they released more music though).Now let’s talk about Blackpink because I’ve talked about BTS enough: Blackpink is probably the most popular girl group. Obviously, BTS is not a girl group. I swear if someone says they’re girls because they wear makeup, I’m going to slam my head into a wall. That’s so sexist to say. Anyway, I can’t think of a girl group that is more popular than BP right now. Of course, that could change.Blackpink’s D4 MV reached 1B views before BTS’s DNA. That’s most likely because Blinks have nothing else to stream. BP has one comeback a year. They have four albums, 3 of them being recordings of BP’s live performances. One is an actual album, but includes songs previously released in singles.Blackpink debuted 3 years after BTS. I’m not expecting BP to have more music than BTS. It just kinda sucks that they don’t release a ton of music. You’d think they’d have lots of music to choose from (not including Japanese versions & live performance recordings), but they really don’t.Blackpink’s label sucks. I’m just going to say it. YG Entertainment has lied about things. And their dumb rule where BP is limited to one comeback a year. Don’t even get me started on the incident with Lisa’s manager.I know the last one didn’t have anything to do with Blackpink’s fame, but it needed to be said. I do not hate either of these groups. I stan both of them, but of course I stan one harder. It’s probably obvious because of my profile pic. But anyway, if you do like my answer upvotes are appreciated <3 I spent a long time writing this and making sure it’s a quality one :) Have a great day & go stream BP’s HYLT + BTS’s Stay Gold! ~Vanessa

Answer is edited after Ice cream, Dynamite, Lovesick Girls, Savage Love, etc, comeback, all iltalicized Overtaking /əʊvəˈteɪk/ become greater or more successful than Youtube/24 Hours BTS:Dynamite 101.1 M (ARMYs claimed that there were some views deducted and was freezed but not very dramatic like On or Idol)- Song entirely done in English, due to this some Blinks and other K-Pop stans are not accepting it as an actual record- no. 1Boy With Luv 74.6 M (ARMYs claim 14 M views were deducted), no.4ON Kinetic Mainfesto Film: Come Prima 46.5 M(ARMYs claim that about 45 to 67 M views were deducted), no. 9Idol 45.9 M (Views were frozen, approximately 30 M lost) no. 10ON 43.8 M (ARMYs claim about 60 to 100 M views were deducted) no.11BlackPink:How You Like That 86.3 M (Blinks claim about 4 M views were deducted, but also claims that YG should work better because they put it in The People&Blogs category in the beginning) no. 2Ice Cream 79.0 M (Blink Solo and OT3 stans stood out here, actual goal (I saw on multiple social platforms by multiple users was around 120~150 M, many Blinks thought that this was possible because of Selenators)- no.3Lovesick Girls 61.4 M, no. 6Kill This Love 56.7 M no. 7Ddu-Du Ddu-Du 36.2 M no. 17These are only the 24 Hours and is only from the Top 20 list. There are 5 MVs of BTS on the list, and 5 MVs of Blackpink on the list. YouTube video ranking are hard because they are both pretty equal here and because there is not correct way to see it. I calculated it in two ways If I average the ranking: BTS is at 1+4+9+10+11/5 which is 35/5, 17.5. Blackpink is at 2+3+6+7+17/5 which is also at 35/5, 17.5, which means that they are tied.If I average the views: BTS is at 101.1+74.6+46.5+45.9+43.8/5, which is 311.9/5, which is 62.38 M, while Blackpink is at 319.6/5, which is 63.92 M, which is 1.54 M higher, which is a close but a win for BlackpinkI know that some ARMYs may try to claim that because YouTube deleted views from our MVs, this is not fair; however, looking at it officially, Blackpink has been more successful.BTS: 0 BlackPink: 1 Twitter/Most-liked BTSNever Not 2.8 M (no. 8)Army Painted Me 2.6 M (no. 11)Duh 2.4 M (no. 13)사진 찍으니까 방해하는 정국이 그리고 그대로 올리는 석지니 2.3 M (no. 15)안경 2.3 M (no. 16)아미 덕분에 김밥 맛있게 먹고 가요 2.3 M (no. 17)오랜만에 2.3 M (no. 18)💜 🤍ARMY 보고싶어요🤍 💜 2.3 M (no. 19)어린왕자와 함께 한 꿀FM 당분간 안녕~ #0613FM_0606 2.3 M (no. 20)BlackPinkNone, I don’t mean to offend Blinks, I’m a Blink myself, but BlackPink really can’t follow BTS in TwitterBTS has 9 in the Top 20 List while BlackPink does not have one so BTS won in Twitter. BTS: 1 BlackPink: 1 iTunes (most #1s) BTSV Sweet Night #1 in 105 countriesBTS Black Swan #1 in 104 countriesEtc.BlackPinkBlackPink How You Like That #1 in 60 countriesBlackPink Kill This Love # 1 in 37 countriesObvious? BTS: 2 BlackPink: 1 This is all for now. I think that it is actually YG’s fault that BlackPink can’t go further. I wish this answer didn’t offend anyone and have a good day ARMYs and Blinks! (Also, give me more things to add on to this list)
